pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for the STARTS Model // Contains functions for estimating the STARTS model of Kenny and Zautra (1995, 2001) DOI:10.1037/0022-006X.63.1.52, DOI:10.1037/10409-008. Penalized maximum likelihood estimation and Markov Chain Monte Carlo estimation are also provided, see Luedtke, Robitzsch and Wagner (2017) DOI:10.1037/met0000155.
